title: Electron app
description: Desktop application created with the JavaScript framework Electron.js, the latter allows the creation of interface from HTML/CSS/JavaScript.

title: Slim web app
description: Small web application to display and update data on a server, created with the framework PHP Slim.

title: Lorann Java
description: Remake of the Lorann game in Java with Swing and AWT, MVC oriented architecture.

title: Laravel web app
description: Web application created with the Laravel PHP framework. Theme: CESI's BDE website.

title: Java interface
description: Interface to read and display data from a COM port connected to an Arduino, created with Java FX.

title: Boulder Dash Java
description: Remake of the Boulder Dash game in Java with Swing and AWT, MVC oriented architecture.

title: .NET project
description: Backup application created from scratch using .NET Core (UWP) and framework (WPF).
